name: Dot.io - Agar.io - Save Dot
description:
You are a dot.
You have to save yourself from other dots!

The dots in the rival will attack you as an individual. There will be many dots who will attack you but you have to escape them by guiding your own dot by tapping on the screen!

-> iPhone X Support
-> All iPads, iPhones & iPods Support
-> Really enjoyable game and can be played by all age groups & even family
-> Full version download & all the features are unlocked and no in-app-purchases required.

Rate the game Now!

Download Now & Enjoy the fun!
